level.heading: PRESERVATION OF EXISTING RIGHTS AND LIABILITIES (ยง 7-916) Rights accrued and liabilities incurred prior to October 1, 1993, under Wagerders issued by the Wage-Hour Board, shall be governed by provisions of theespective Wage Order issued by the Wage-Hour Board.
SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 187 (January 14, 1994).
